properties.areaDesc: Western Essex; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 1 at 8:19PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
The potential for light freezing drizzle will exist later tonight
and continue through the early morning hours on Thursday across
portions of northern New York. Areas east and south of Highway 11
in Saint Lawrence and Franklin counties of New York as well as the
western third of Essex County in New York appears to have the best
chance of seeing some light freezing drizzle. Towns that could
experience light freezing drizzle include Gouverneur, Malone,
Parishville, Saranac Lake, Wanakena, Tupper Lake, Newcomb, and
Lake Placid. If traveling across this area later tonight and early
Thursday please be aware that slick roads may exist due to the
light freezing rain.

NWSheadline: Light Freezing Drizzle Possible Over Parts Of Northern New York
